snippet: The Food and Drug Administration is permitting an experimental drug from Tekmira Pharmaceuticals even though it had halted a trial because side effects were observed.
abstract: Food and Drug Administration is permitting second experimental drug from Tekmira Pharmaceuticals to be tried by people in Africa stricken with Ebola virus; it had halted trial because side effects were observed.
lead_paragraph: The Food and Drug Administration is permitting an experimental drug from Tekmira Pharmaceuticals even though it had halted a trial because side effects were observed.

headline.main: Second Drug Is Allowed for Treatment of Ebola
headline.print_headline: Second Drug Is Allowed for Treatment of Ebola
